name: Burnout (itch) (River_H202)
description:
Languages: English

~

You wake up in a dark hall with a single light and a door on the other side. You feel sick, as if you're dying. You race to the door for help but there's just another hall on the other side, and another one after that… Will you make it out of this seemingly endless hallway alive or will you accept a grim fate?

~

Burnout is a precision platformer where your health is time.

Traverse 6 quick levels

Playtime is about 10 minutes on average

~

Content Warning: There is a scene that could be interpreted as suicide, so please be safe and don't play if you think it could be triggering.

~
